snippet: New this week: “Ssss” by VCMG, “Ode” by the Brad Mehldau Trio and “Roots Before Branches” by Henry Cole and the Afrobeat Collective.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews Ssss album by VCMG; Nate Chinen reviews album Ode from Brad Mehldau Trio; Ben Ratliff reviews recording Roots Before Branches by Henry Cole and the Afrobeat Collective.

byline.original: By JON PARELES, NATE CHINEN and BEN RATLIFF

lead_paragraph: New this week: “Ssss” by VCMG, “Ode” by the Brad Mehldau Trio and “Roots Before Branches” by Henry Cole and the Afrobeat Collective.

headline.seo: New Albums From VCMG, Brad Mehldau Trio and Henry Cole
headline.main: New Albums From VCMG, Brad Mehldau Trio and Henry Cole and the Afrobeat Colective
headline.print_headline: New Albums From VCMG, Brad Mehldau Trio and Henry Cole and the Afrobeat Colective
